attributes.action: ' Parliament should be moved to be outside London  '
attributes.background:
It has been estimated that refurbishing Parliament could take 5-8 years and cost between £3.5 - 5.0 billion.
Nothing could transform the UK's North - South prosperity divide more than moving Parliament to the Midlands or York.

rejection.details:
We're not sure where you'd like Parliament to move to.

If you'd like Parliament to move to Birmingham, you could sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/211239
